title: Interpretation of a dream about amber

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about amber in a dream is multiple, as it differs according to the state of the dream. Both the fortune teller’s feeling and the science of dream interpretation have come to us to train a person so that he can understand the different symbols and signs, and be careful in many cases. This is what we will discover on the summit platform. Different interpretations of Al-Osaimi for seeing amber in a dream In the context of discussing the interpretation of a dream about amber in a dream, Al-Osaimi explained many different interpretations, the most important of which are the following: It is mentioned that the general interpretation of the appearance of amber in a person's dream is that it is a sign that many good and good things will happen in the dreamer's life. If a person sees amber in his dream, this means that he will find many of the things he lost. Seeing someone smoking with amber can be interpreted as a person's victory over his enemies and getting rid of his problems. Inhaling the scent of amber in a dream indicates that the owner of the dream will give birth to a male child. Whoever sees that his amber is lost in his dream is an expression of losing money in his trade. Seeing amber in large quantities in a dream means that the person will achieve many high positions and a distinguished position in his life. Interpretation of a dream about amber in a dream for a single woman Al-Osaimi explained that seeing amber in a dream for a single girl has different meanings, the most important of which are the following: The presence of amber in the mother of an unmarried girl expresses the coming of a lot of good and benefits for the girl in her life. Amber In a dream for an unmarried girl, it is evidence that she will get married soon. When a girl smells amber in her dream, this dream is an expression of the beauty of her morals and her good reputation among people. The person who sees amber in his dream is an expression of his enjoyment of health and physical strength. If an unmarried woman dreams of setting fire to amber, this is evidence that she has made a mistake in religion and followed doctrines. If an unmarried woman dreams that she has lost amber, this is a sign that she will lose a lot of money. Whoever sees that he is wiping his face or body with amber, this means that something good will come to the dreamer. Read more: Interpretation of seeing a rabbit in a dream Interpretation of a dream about amber in a dream for a married and pregnant woman Al-Osaimi mentioned several indications and interpretations of seeing amber in a woman's dream, the most important of which are: Amber in a married woman's dream is a clear indication of the woman's comfort in her life and a sense of marital bliss and peace of mind. Amber in a married woman's dream can be an expression of her imminent pregnancy. Amber in a pregnant woman's dream is one of the good dreams that expresses the ease of her birth and the health of the fetus and mother. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is receiving amber As a gift from her husband, this dream was evidence of the fulfillment of her desire to have her newborn child. Interpretation of seeing incense wood in a man’s dream Regarding the interpretation of the dream of amber in a dream, Al-Osaimi explained the interpretation of the dream of incense for a man as follows: If we dream that we are buying a man’s incense made of wood, this means that he will achieve great success in his career and occupy a prestigious position. Also, if you see someone buying an incense stick, this indicates new changes in one’s life. Seeing incense in the house

Also, if you see someone buying an incense stick, this indicates new changes in one’s life. Seeing incense in the home

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing light in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: The bright light on the face shows the purity of heart and good intentions of a person. Seeing a bright light on the face of a dream indicates many interpretations, including the good deeds a person does and his commitment to worship and getting closer to God Almighty, and here the whiteness of the faces means that the people of Paradise and the righteous. Actions, just as seeing the dead have very bright faces, this indicates their position and position in Paradise, and through our position today, we learn together about the interpretation of seeing a strong light on the face in a dream of the true Imam. You also know the interpretation of a dream about light on the face, and we also explain to you the interpretation of seeing a bright light. Interpretation of seeing a bright light on the face in a dream for one girl. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that one of the people she knows is emitting a strong light from his face, this indicates the sincerity of that person And his good intentions, and God knows best. But if an unmarried girl sees that he is looking at the woman and looking at her face, she will see a strong bright light. This indicates that she will marry a good and generous man, and live a decent life with him, and God knows best. But if an unmarried girl sees that one of her parents shines a white light on his face. And if he is alive and blessed, this indicates his good life in the world, and it shows that he has attained honor. Great and high status. This may be an obligatory Hajj, God willing, and if one of her parents dies, his face will be illuminated by a strong light. Because this indicates his good position in Paradise with God Almighty, and God knows best. And when an unmarried girl sees in a dream a bright light shining on her face. This indicates that there is someone who wants to marry her and is always thinking about her, and he may not know her, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing light in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is looking at her husband’s face and sees a bright light from his face. This indicates his love for her and the purity of his heart with her. It may indicate the prosperity of his business and his profit in that trade. It may indicate that God is giving him a good wife who will help him in life’s affairs, and God knows best. But if a married woman sees that she is looking in the mirror and sees that her face is radiating a strong light from it, this indicates the kindness and happiness that She took it in her last days, even if she was suffering from heartbreak. When a married woman sees that her familiar face is shining with a strong light. This indicates that he is one of the righteous and righteous, and that God Almighty is Greatest and Most Knowing. But if a married woman sees that one of her deceased acquaintances comes to her in a dream And he sees a bright light. This indicates that he is one of the people of Paradise, and that the light emanating from his face indicates his highness and great status with God Almighty, Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of the dream of light by Ibn Sirin. Seeing light in a dream is evidence of insight and clarity of things. Seeing light in a dream indicates a solution. For some old problems that the fortuneteller faced. Seeing a car light in a dream is evidence of an experience you have with your life partner. Seeing the sun’s rays means searching for a solution to some things and problems that one is going through. Interpretation of a dream about light for a man: If a man sees in a dream that he turns on the light at night, this means hand

title: Interpretation of a dream about an incomplete child in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a retarded child in a dream. In the following lines, we will show the interpretation of a dream about a retarded child in a dream and whether it is good or not, as stated in the books of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about an incomplete child in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about an incomplete child in a dream may be evidence of failure to achieve goals, as it may It indicates the incompleteness of the thing he is striving for, and God knows the unseen. When a married man sees a retarded child, this can lead to things that prevent him from achieving goals, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees an incompletely developed child, this may indicate that he has not completed his goals, and God knows best. The unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a child with colored eyes in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about a child with colored eyes in a dream. Seeing a child with blue eyes can be a sign of goodness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a child with blue eyes, this may lead to happiness, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees a child with blue eyes in a dream, it may represent that. Happy circumstances, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a child with blue eyes in a dream, this may indicate calm and comfort. Interpretation of a dream of a big child in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a big child in a dream. We did not find specific meanings for his vision. However, seeing an ugly child in a dream can be a sign of anxiety. And sadness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees an ugly child, this may lead to crises and difficulties, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees an ugly child, this may lead to crises that he will be exposed to, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams that my child lost me in a dreamInterpretation of the dream that my child lost me in a dream could be a sign On the loss of a great opportunity, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees the loss of her young child, she may move to her place in her husband’s heart, and God knows best. In the event that the dreamer sees the loss of a son, it may express sadness, and God is Greatest, and God knows best. When she sees the loss of a son, it may be a sign of anxiety, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my child getting married in a dream. Interpretation Dreams that my child is getting married in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing a husband as a child can lead to prestige and power, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees marrying a child in his dream, it may be a sign of a bright future, and God knows best. It also can It expresses work and profit, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of dreams that my child was kidnapped in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my son being kidnapped in a dream. Kidnapping a son could be a sign of getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his son being kidnapped by an unknown person, this may lead to things that are not good, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When A married woman sees the kidnapping of her son by a stranger. This may lead to evil that befalls her wife and her family, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams that my child died in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that my son died in a dream. The death of a son can indicate salvation from enemies, God willing. When you see the death of a child, it can lead to Trouble and judgment, God knows the unseenThe death of a child can also reflect wrong decisions, God knows the unseen, while the death of a son may indicate that the machinations of enemies have been thwarted

title: Interpretation of seeing worms in a dream for a married and pregnant woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing worms in a dream: Worms may come in different places, such as coming out of one place or one person, or they may be white in color or something else. To learn more about the interpretation of seeing worms in a dream, follow the upcoming interpretations. Interpretation of seeing worms in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees worms and they are in her hair or in her hair, in the interpretation of worms, here is good and a blessing coming, which may be children or money. But if a married woman sees worms in the house, This indicates the presence of major problems in the home and may indicate the presence of envious people in the home or someone who feels jealous of the home and its people. Interpretation of seeing worms in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees that worms are eating from his body, the interpretation of the dream is often that his children will eat a lot and a lot of his money. If the sleeper sees many worms in his clothes, then this is a sign of goodness, livelihood, and blessing. Interpretation of a dream about worms coming out of the body: Whoever sees a worm coming out of his arm, it is possible that the sleeper is eating illegal money or obtaining forbidden or illegal money. But if you dream of sleeping, with worms coming out Worms from the anus. The interpretation of the dream means that the sleeper will give birth, and God knows best. But if the worms come out of the mouth, it is possible for the sleeper to practice gossip and gossip. Interpretation of a dream about black worms in a dream. Black worms usually carry warnings such as deception, deception, or the presence of envious people in one’s life in general. . Black worms are a strong indication that there is deception on the road. Interpretation of seeing worms in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees worms in her dream in white, then most likely the pregnant woman will give birth to a girl, and if she sees worms in black, the child will be a male, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing white worms In a dreamUnfortunately, white worms in a dream usually indicate that the sleeper is exposed to corruption or is one who takes bribes, for example, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing worms in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees white worms, the dream interpretation is that there is a good groom. The heart has good morals, but if it sees black worms, then the groom has many corrupt morals. Worms bring different interpretations in a dream for the sleeper, whether he is married, a pregnant woman, or single, as we explained to you the interpretation of seeing worms coming out of the mouth, stomach, hand, or body in general, by God. Glory be to Him, the greatest and most knowledgeable.

title: Interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream and sleeping in a coffin in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the coffin for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and an unmarried married man, whether she is being carried to the grave, or sleeping inside the box instead of the body, and more. Ibn Shirin. Interpretation of a dream about a coffin in a dream. This is what dream interpretation scholars say. If the sleeper sees himself sleeping in a coffin And the fact that it is carried on necks indicates that this person will raise his status very high among the people. But if the person saw that he was making his own coffin or coffin, this indicates that this person is doing many praiseworthy things and that he will receive a reward for this act. But if Someone saw in a dream that he buys a coffin or that someone gave him a coffin, which indicates that this person will have a great status. But if the sleeping person can see what they carried in the coffin and people begin to pray for him for mercy and forgiveness, this indicates a lot of sustenance and satisfaction that will happen to this person. A person, but if people slander him, this indicates poverty, sadness, and illness. Dreaming of a funeral in a dream Ibn Shaheen says: If a person sees in a dream that there is a group walking in a funeral, this means that the owner of the funeral had the authority to rule over these people, but he was persecuting and torturing them. He also says: If a person sees that his funeral is walking on the ground, this indicates that that person’s journey is near, but if a woman sees that, this indicates that she will get married, and if she is married, this indicates that. Her husband spoils the religion. If he sees that he has fallen from his coffin, this indicates the fall of that person from a higher position in the world, and it is also said that this person is a hypocrite. Dream of seeing yourself sleeping in one coffin. Experts in dream interpretation say that if a girl sees in a dream, it indicates the reality of her death and pregnancy. In a coffin indicates that she will get married soon. Seeing him sleeping in a married woman’s coffin. A married woman who sees that she has died and was buried indicates that this girl is spreading corruption in the land. However, if the woman is married and pregnant, this indicates that she will give birth safely and that her child is safe and in good health. But if a pregnant woman sees that she died and was being carried to her funeral without anyone crying over her, this indicates that she will give birth, but it will be difficult for her to carry and her child will get sick.

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing roses in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Roses in a dream, and among the symbols of roses are love, kindness, tenderness, and fame. Jurists have considered that seeing roses is a harbinger of goodness, benefit, and a happy life, and they are worthy of praise for their vision and importance. Meanings and special occasions of seeing roses. Roses in a dream: Seeing roses represents happiness, victory, and great wealth. Rose is a good diet, great benefit and fragrant biography. Roses can be interpreted as temporary pleasure or simple pleasure that ends quickly, and a rose bush indicates enjoyment of life, longevity, and recovery from illness. Whoever sees that he is collecting roses, this is an indication of achieving benefits and benefits as a result of useful work, sincerity of intention, and good speech and heart. This vision may indicate... A simple temporary pleasure, because once roses are collected, they quickly wither. The jasmine rose symbolizes love, friendliness, nostalgia, and longing, while jasmine symbolizes cooperation, useful works, new beginnings, and brilliance. Roses in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that roses indicate position, honour, honour, money, payment, and good conduct. Good morals, insightful vision, gentleness on the side, intelligent dealing, quick response, adapting to changes, staying on instinct, and good condition. Roses also symbolize children, long offspring, good offspring, charitable works, and fruitful partnerships. Seeing roses also expresses the return of the absent, meeting the traveler, and the end of Longing upon arrival, because the meaning of the word from the word rose is what is referred to, i.e. came and came. title: Interpretation of a fish in a dream

preview.html: If he sees a small fish, this indicates some small problems that can be solved, God willing, and we will find out from our website gptafser.com/ The interpretation of a dream about a fish. Interpretation of a fish in a dream for one girl. Seeing a fish in a dream for one girl indicates many interpretations that involve specific symbols. As an unmarried girl, if she dreams that she is eating grilled fish. It is one of the interpretations that indicates that you are hearing good news and may indicate the engagement of this girl while awake. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is cutting fish, this is a sign that she will get what she wants. Or it could It indicates the personality of the person who has the vision, meaning that she has a strong personality and is very stubborn. Whereas if she sees in her dream that she is cooking fish, then she has an unmarried girl. He will soon get a lot of food, and this may mean that he will get whatever he wants in the future, God willing. If He saw the fish moving in a dream to a single girl. This dream indicates that there are many good things that will come to her, but after a while. Seeing fishing in a dream may indicate to an unmarried girl. In achieving the desire or goal for which she was striving, and God Almighty Success for her. A dream about cleaning wonderful fish indicates a dream for an unmarried girl. In the profits that the dreamer will achieve in the coming days, God willing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about eating fish with relatives. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a small fish in a married woman’s dream is one of the dreams that does not It brings goodness. It may indicate that there are some simple problems present in the life of the dreamer. Eating fish in a married woman’s dream is a dream that has many meanings. It indicates that he makes demands, or takes the required things in her life. That is, he will get what he wants in its wake. Grilled fish in a married woman’s dream means that she will experience a lot of goodness and benefits thanks to God Almighty. Whereas if a married woman sees that the fish has many thorns, this was also realized in the dream. The dream may indicate the presence of some problems in her life. Accordingly, He resorts to God Almighty by praying often to remove these problems, God willing. If a married woman sees that she is eating fish and does not see it in a dream. A person may conspire against her, and he may not know this deception, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. A small fish in a married woman’s dream indicates useless talk. It may indicate useless words. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a man and its meaning. Seeing fish laden with oil for a married man. It is one of the dreams that indicate reform, or diligence in acquiring lawful money. Buying fish in a married man’s dream indicates useless talk that may It indicates that God is Most High and All-Knowing. Fishing in troubled waters for a married man is a sign of hearing unpleasant news, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. A limited number of fish can be seen in a married man’s dream. A lie in food comes as much as the fatigue of insight comes. If a married man sees in The dream was that he caught a fish and gave it to his wife. The vision made it clear that he would get it

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a complete apology in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with an interpretation of seeing a complete apology in a dream. Many people are in a complete dream, so we have gathered for you, my dear, to God, to see in a dream the complete person asking for forgiveness, as well as seeing a family member apologizing in a complete dream and an apology from the enemy in A complete dream. A complete interpretation of seeing Ibn Sirin asking for forgiveness in a dream. The interpretation of forgiveness in a dream is complete, as the scholar Ibn Sirin said about it, in reference to the dreamer’s repentance for what he is capable of doing, whether with people or between him and God. Also, seeing a complete apology in The dream is evidence of the dreamer’s desire to reconcile with someone, whether he is a loved one, a family member, or a friend. A full apology came to the dreamer in the dream, and he asked her to approach God as quickly as possible, repent, and turn away from him from all disobedience and sins. See also: Why dream of seeing remorse in a dreamWhy does a single woman dream of apologizing? The interpretation of a dream about requesting parental leave for a woman is evidence of her desire to obey them and her feeling of love and great affection towards them. Asking forgiveness from a lover or brother-in-law in a dream full of a lonely girl is a sign that she should monitor her behavior and not offend To herself. A full apology in a dream, as some interpretation researchers point out, testifies to forgiveness, tolerance and reconciliation between the dreamer and some of his relatives. See also: Why dream of seeing fear in a dreamWhy dream of an apology from a married womanInterpretation of a married woman who sees herself behaving otherwise and asks for forgiveness Forgiveness is evidence of the goodness of her heart and a sign of her forgiveness. Asking forgiveness and apologizing from her husband in a woman’s dream is complete evidence that good things will happen in her life and that she will enter into joy and happiness and a sign that she will hear the good news. Interpretation of seeing an apology in a man: Apologizing to an enemy in a dream by a man Completely, it is an unpleasant vision, indicating his degree of weakness and self-doubt, and that he must change from this character. In addition, seeing a man apologizing in a dream is complete, as some researchers said in interpreting this, as a result of the oppression and injustice that the pregnant woman suffers during Her relationship with someone close to her. Seeing an apology in a dream means accepting repentance and returning to God, and not following the bad path that the dreamer took in his life. See also: Why do you dream of seeing forgiveness and its meaning in a dream? The apology to the enemy has been completed in the dream. The apology to the enemy in a dream is completed for the dreamer with visions Hamida indicates the dreamer’s victory over his enemies and salvation from everything that could befall him. And the dreamer’s dream of asking for forgiveness from the enemy indicates an unpleasant vision that indicates the enemies’ victory over him and his harm and the immersion of his life in many problems and worries. Why do you dream of an ex-lover apologizing? Seeing a lover apologizing in... The dream is full of visions that show the dreamer a feeling of sadness and embarrassment, as well as evidence of a family member’s dissatisfaction. See also: Why do you see a lie in a dream? If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comments below and our team will answer you.

title: Interpretation of seeing the Messenger in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Seeing the Messenger in a dream: The Holy Messenger - may God bless him and grant him peace - a vision in a dream of kindness and blessing and the presence of many good meanings that will come to the dreamer soon, and this vision symbolizes love for people and the desire to help and assist. Get what the viewer wants from desires and other clues that we look at next... Follow us Seeing the Messenger in a dream Seeing the Holy Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream brings a lot of good news and good things that will happen to the dreamer in his life. This dream also symbolizes that the dreamer is living A good life and he feels the comfort and peace that he wanted before. One scholar narrated that seeing the Prophet in a dream symbolizes liberation from injustice and hatred and replacing it with love, and the dreamer lives in a lot of goodness and benefit. And in the vision of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, there is grace, goodness, and many blessings. Seeing the Messenger In a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing the Holy Prophet in a dream, according to what Imam Ibn Sirin narrated, is very good news, and the dreamer will have many things that he wants. If the dreamer is poor or has stumbled upon money, then seeing the Prophet, peace and blessings of God be upon him, in a dream indicates goodness and improvement. The dreamer’s conditions and the ease that the person will enjoy in the coming period. If the dreamer is imprisoned and in severe distress, this vision symbolizes freedom from trouble and comfort, and soon he will be released from prison. The presence of injustice and fatigue in the dreamer’s life will disappear by the command of the Lord, in the event that the Messenger appears in his dream. And he would have escaped from the worry and sorrow that hinder his life. Seeing the Messenger in a dream from NabulsiSeeing the Holy Messenger in a dream as narrated by Imam Nabulsi indicates that the dreamer is living a good life in obedience to God and following the Sunnah of His Prophet. This vision also brings good news and great benefits to the pioneer. Vision The Messenger in a single woman’s dream: Seeing the Messenger in one dream indicates that she is a good girl with many good qualities that make her loved by people, close to her family, and honored by her parents. The presence of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a girl’s dream is good news and evidence of the goodness and benefits that It will be the dreamer's share in her life and that the Lord will help her get rid of the affliction. Which he suffered from. If the girl was in the study stage and saw the Messenger of God in a dream, this indicates that she stopped her education and reached higher and higher levels. If she was going through a period of fatigue and tension in reality and saw the Holy Messenger in a dream, this means that she will get rid of her pain and a life awaits her. More beautiful and happiest. If the fiancée sees the Messenger in a dream, this means that she will soon marry her fiancé and will live special moments with him. If the dreamer feels the Noble Messenger in a dream without seeing him, this means that the coming period in her world will be happier than what she passed and that there is stability and comfort that she will feel. If an unmarried woman suffers from a health problem and says the name of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, then this indicates escaping fatigue, staying away from pain, and improving her health condition. Seeing the Prophet in a dream for a married woman is...

title: Interpretation of the appearance of rice in a dream for a married woman, eating rice in a dream for a married woman, and cooking rice in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rice in a dream for a married woman: Seeing rice is considered one of the good visions that carry many connotations that herald the dreamer of a bright future. This vision has many interpretations that differ based on many considerations, including that rice may be white or black, and it may be cooked or raw. Rice can be mixed with milk. What concerns us in this article is that we study all the special cases and indicators of seeing rice in a dream, especially for a married woman. Interpretation of the appearance of rice in a dream for a married woman. Rice in a dream for a married woman. Seeing rice expresses growth, fertility, continuous work, and noticeable progress in the land and inclination. To expand the scope of business and achieve high rates of success and prosperity. As for the interpretation of a dream about rice for a married woman, this vision expresses the responsibilities and tasks assigned to her and her completion on time, and enjoying flexibility and acumen in dealing with appointments. If a woman sees rice in her home, this indicates On a living income, which expresses good management and management, good judgment on things, and insight into the future. This vision also indicates the great efforts made by the visionary to achieve the desired goal and the ability to solve many complex issues and get rid of worries and sorrows. And if you see someone giving her Rice, this indicates the endless goodness and generosity of God, the abundance of food and goodness, the gradual improvement of conditions, the fulfillment of many needs, and the completion of projects that were disrupted due to circumstances beyond their control. The previous vision may be an indication of the responsibilities that are being transferred to them or the needs that are being asked of them. Providing it without delay or delay and feeling insomnia and physical fatigue, which increases the burden on her. And if you see that he is peeling rice, this indicates the search for a source of livelihood and the rejection of many imaginary offers, because he realizes that they entail some kind of danger, avoiding doubt, forbidden, and being content with a little work. The honorable. And good conditions and morals. Rice in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of the vision of rice that this vision indicates effort and diligent effort, continuous effort in which the dreamer does not skimp, mastery of the art and sincerity in the work that you do. This vision also expresses the Earning money after hardship and misery, achieving many goals after a lot of struggle and patience, and always being preoccupied with how to manage their affairs. And if she sees her husband giving her rice, this indicates the assertion of her rights or the large number of family requests and the loss of the ability to control all the events and rulings that follow. And if she sees She is eating rice, this indicates satisfaction and praise, and the inner desire to reach the rank and position that suits her, saving and avoiding unnecessary extravagance and planning for tomorrow’s matters. This vision also indicates endless fatigue and fatigue, and the accumulation of responsibilities and burdens that are placed on his shoulders without him saying a word. Say a word, and show a solid spirit
